content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Great job! An interesting game with a lot of things to implement. I think there can be a bunch of different strategies. Great innovative opportunities for debugging. I'm looking forward to see it as multi.

Default code for Go failed:
./Answer.go:38:17: meCanCapture declared and not used

And Pascal
Answer.pas(24,5) Error: Duplicate identifier "houseId"
Answer.pas(31,5) Error: Duplicate identifier "house1"
Answer.pas(32,5) Error: Duplicate identifier "house2"
Answer.pas(38,5) Error: Duplicate identifier "house1"
Answer.pas(39,5) Error: Duplicate identifier "house2"
Answer.pas(103) Fatal: There were 5 errors compiling module, stopping

And one more about Summary: https://yadi.sk/i/rwhcT55aL1JZJw
But "Boss 3 attacked 0 units"

Is the Game Summary displayed correctly?
https://yadi.sk/i/4RSG0Lvub_z3Wg

Just started, so couple of initial thoughts:
1) Code stub is a bit out of sync with rules - there are link_count, linkable_count in rules, but path_count, linkable_count in template. Very minor diff, not sure it should be fixed, just a comment.
2) League-1 boss is too strong :) Usually stdin parse + simple heuristic is required to pass into uper-wood league and I was not able to do it after 1.5 hour from start :) But if league-4 is like Legend, than it is fine.
I think it would be usefull to add information about moving: since it is possible to specify any reachable destination and not only one of the direct neighbors.
Hi! I forgot to add amount of units in my command and there was no message in Game Summary. Just end of the game and -1 points

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: i would like to compete and (pushed to) use the novel enhanced debug features in this game

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Very interesting and very different from classic board games

Breaking change in input format: the possible pairs for ADD_PATH are now given.
For details see https://github.com/eulerscheZahl/TryAngle-Catch/commit/e48e8dfa2329d713b6784cdc7a45eafea43574f4

Hello eulerscheZahl,
Another strange behaviour, in some case, the triangle list given by the referee contains 2 times the same triangle (cf https://www.codingame.com/replay/522306339 : triangle 4 32 33 & triangle 5 32 33 are given 2 times)

Hello eulerscheZahl,
With this game "https://www.codingame.com/replay/522300419", it seems than the win/loss condition "80% of triangle owned by one player" is not implemented.

Hello eulerscheZahl,
Seems complex to master ! 
Platinum rift ++++ !
Thank you for this proposal
Special thanks to aCat, Gabbek and struct for testing. Sorry for dragging you into it.

Thanks for your kind words.
It also has some new features like assigning a static color for yourself (no more cheering for the wrong player by accident), a debug mode with simplified geometries and the possibility to draw your own annotations.
I've got to know the SDK (and the ways around it) a little better with this contribution.

You missed the backstory, I was actually hoping for a community contest. But it's not going to happen :(

Oups
An error occurred (#UNAUTHORIZED): "You are not authorised to view replay 522300419".

Share a screenshot please

I can't access any replays as long as the game isn't approved.
Please share something that allows me to reproduce it.
A screenshot for the win condition and a seed for your 2nd bugreport (assuming it's wrong in turn 1 already).
They were inspired by the RAIC debug features kovi :)

There is a tooltip in the replay timeline saying "unknown command".
But I guess I can add it to the game summary as well.

https://github.com/eulerscheZahl/TryAngle-Catch/commit/3cf215a7006114a2b947274dc11653b7cc3fc66e
Good point, I should mention the auto-pathfinding.

1) Thanks for pointing that out, I updated the statement.

2) The first boss is supposed to be easy but not trivial.
It picks 3 units at random and moves those to the triangle that can be captured the fastest. For the remaining units it's just random movement. And spawning new units as long as there are less own units than houses.
If you have some code that is easier to beat but still better than just random, feel free to send it to me and I will replace the boss.

That's actually 2 bugs: attacking 0 units and the summary is out of sync with the game (1 turn too late).
Thanks for reporting, that's what I get for adding it in a hacky way. Should be fixed now.

Go: I didn't know about that but don't see it as a problem. It will go away when you start using that variable.

Pascal: kovi told me already. I reported it to CodinGame, as I see the fault on their code generator. Thibaud opened a ticket for it, so the problem will get solved without me changing the contribution eventually ;)

For me the start was not easy. I tried to create a simple solution which appropriate for a wood league. It took a fair amount of time.
So the first thing I was thinking about is removing SPAWN from that league for simplicity. But maybe this is too much of a change.
Second, the Boss is too optimal for captures. As example:

Boss
   D1                    D0
   |                       |
   A1                    A1
  / \                    /  \
B1 _ C0  =>   B1__C1

My silly bot
   D1                   D0
   |                       |
   A1                   A2
  / \                     /  \
B1 _ C0  =>   B1__C0

Based on your feedback the first 2 bosses no longer consider all permutations of corners, which will result in such behavior sometimes.
They will also use drawing commands. Change the viewer settings to see what triangle they want to take (debug drawing -> ON).

As a minor issue - there are not any Game summary during a game. It would be nice if there were some notices like "Player 1 captured 2 triangles", "Player 1 spawned 3 units", "Player 1 killed 1 unit" and so on.

I fear that this will cause a lot of clutter. There's a lot going on in this game. And as I've learned for Number Shifting, the game summary is limited to somewhere around 1kB per turn.
I can give it a try later today to get a feeling how it looks.
I updated the contribution. Now the referee code starts getting messy on the last meters :(
https://imgur.com/a/SLKEbir
The link illustrates the 2 problems.

Thanks for sharing. Only the unused triangles count, so you have less than 80% coverage.

On your other bug: I ran 200 games offline and one of them allowed me to reproduce the double triangle. I'll debug it now ;)
Ok sorry for my bad undestanding of the rule !

No problem. We can discuss if the rule is even good as it is or if the game should end earlier. What are the odds for a comeback?

I fixed the other problem, was related to my map generator.
I randomly remove links and add them again if I don't like the result (e.g. too few triangles in total).
In some cases I added the same link twice which resulted in 2 same triangles.
Thanks a lot for reporting.

It's a pity this game not beeing a contest !
it would be amazing ! 
But it will be amazing when the multi will be approved !

I'll keep it WIP for a few more days to give time to look into it and avoid a quick approval without proper review. But I'm pretty confident it's working the way it's intended.
Then I count on you guys to give it some attention in the arena :P
